features: Luxurious - Surround yourself with the DreamNorth Pillows for a better night's rest. The breathable cotton cover and the soft filling to provide the most comfortable sleeping experience. (Notes: for the first time user, please follow the user guide to prep your pillow to restore the original look.)

Rest Easy - Rest your head on these high-quality pillows knowing you can go to sleep in pure comfort and relaxation. The filling of the pillow is made from poly gel-filled fiber to ensure maximum comfort for all sleeping position.

Breathable Cotton - The pillow cover is made of 100% cotton fabric material to stay soft, breathable, and dry. Machine washable capabilities enables maintenance of its reusability and fresh appearance.
Hypo-Allergenic - Allergen and chemical free material looks out for the health and wellbeing of our users. Great for individuals with allergies, asthma, and other respiratory difficulties.
Tips & Care - DreamNorth is recommended to spot clean the pillow or hand wash the fabric with mild detergent.
body.description: BREATHABLE MATERIAL The pillow cover is made of 100% cotton fabric material to stay soft, breathable, and dry. Machine washable capabilities enables maintenance of its reusability and fresh appearance. SOFT & COMFORTABLE The ultra-soft texture maximizes comfort while you sleep. Feather-light and soft feel; Lay your head on a pillow of clouds for the best nights' sleep. DIRT RESISTANT The reliable fabric construction offers double needled corded edge and protects the longevity of your pillows with its fade and stain resistant properties. In addition, the pillows prevent dust. ALLERGEN-FREE Great for those with allergies, asthma, and other respiratory difficulties. Health and safety is our top priority!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite pillows
reviews.reviewText: First fell in love with these while pet sitting, then bought a standard set, now a king. I've successfully surrounded myself in a nest of these pillows and it is wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: I bought these and the Beckham Hotel Collection Gel pillows for $39.99. I sleep mainly on my side with another pillow along side me to prop me at a 45 degree angle or so. I'm really picky about pillows which is why I've stayed with mine even though it's now lumpy. The Beckham pillows came first. Supper fluffy and turned out too full/fluffy. Put my neck at an angle and smushed my face when I slept on my side--unless I slept in the very corner. I didn't last the night on it.These DreamNorth pillows came next. Yes, they are more on the flat side, but that's what I want as a side sleeper. I often sleep with my arm under the pillow/under by head so can't have too full a pillow. These were about just right. Soft, but not overly full. Still good support. I realized the other Beckham pillows made a great #2 pillow that props me up. Excellent at that actually. So I will put one of each on my bed and one of each on my guest bed. So nice to have a fresh, clean non-lumpy pillow. Can't believe I waited so long, esp at these low prices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Comfort in a Pack of 2
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my bedroom with the DreamNorth Premium Gel Pillow Loft, coming in a convenient pack of two. After several nights of sleep, I'm ready to share my experience with these pillows in terms of comfort, support, and overall sleep quality.**Comfort and Material:** The pillows feature a gel-filled fiber, which strikes a beautiful balance between softness and support. They are plush and comfortable, molding gently to the shape of the head and neck. The material feels premium, and there's a sense of luxury when you rest on them.**Hypoallergenic Features:** For those sensitive to allergens, these pillows are a great choice. They are hypoallergenic, which is a huge plus for anyone with allergies or asthma. I noticed a reduction in nighttime sniffles, which was a pleasant surprise.**Support and Firmness:** These pillows offer a medium level of firmness. They provide adequate support for both side and back sleepers, keeping the head and neck comfortably aligned. However, if you prefer an extra firm or a very soft pillow, these might not meet your specific firmness preference.**Breathability and Cooling Effect:** The gel fiber does a good job of regulating temperature, keeping you cool throughout the night. This feature is especially appreciated by those who tend to sleep hot or live in warmer climates.**Size and Loft:** The size is standard and fits well in regular pillowcases. The loft is just right – not too high or too flat. They maintain their shape well, bouncing back after use, which is indicative of good quality.**Maintenance and Durability:** These pillows are machine washable, which makes maintenance easy. They held up well in the wash, retaining their shape and fluffiness. The durability seems promising, although longer-term use is needed to fully assess their lifespan.**Price Point:** For a pack of two, the price is reasonable. Considering the quality and features, they offer good value for money.**Limitations:** The pillows might emit a faint chemical smell upon unpacking, but this dissipates after airing them out for a day or two.**Conclusion:** The DreamNorth Premium Gel Pillow Loft pack of 2 is an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their sleep experience. They offer a luxurious feel, balanced support, and hypoallergenic properties, all at a reasonable price point. While they might not cater to every firmness preference, they strike a great balance that will appeal to a wide range of sleepers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow ! Very good value .
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the quality of these pillows. I have neck and shoulder problems from an old injury and toss and turn through out the night. I slept through the night for the first-time in a long while with these pillows. They are named appropriately! Like sleeping on a cloud! I often wake up with pressure pain on my ear but not with these pillows. If you are hesitant about what pillow to buy and want a fluffy , soft, yet supportive pillow give this one a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was not paid for this review
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying that when I received the pillows, inside with the packaging was a card that said 'get $20 Amazon credit when you leave a five-star review'. With that being said I'm going to give you the absolute truth. I don't know if everyone else had the same offer or not.I have had these pillows for a year. When you first get these pillows they are completely flat and rolled up and you have to let them decompress. I think the directions said to give the pillows several hours but I ended up waiting 24 hours just to be sure . The next day they were full, fluffy and soft. The material is very nice feeling but If you like firm pillows these are not for you. They are very fluffy. There is not much support at all. After using the pillows 2 months they became very worn out and lumpy and and they are not filled out and shaped anymore. Even though I don't give these pillows five stars and my review isn't very positive I still use them because they are very easy to shape. You can fold it in half very easily and that's what I usually do. plus I'm a stomach sleeper so sleeping on my stomach on this pillow works out really well since it's not firm at all. So with all this being said I don't personally recommend them for people who need a lot of support and firm pillows. Nor do I recommend it for someone who want them to stay in their normal shape. But if you don't care that much and you just need a pillow then go for it. I hope this helped out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pillows for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the way these pillows feel. They're soft yet sturdy. It's only been a few days but i've been sleeping really well with them
